Longsword Versatile

Blackguard's Sword is one of the Longswords in Baldur's Gate 3. Blackguard's Sword is dropped by That Which Guards, before the entrance of Sarevok's lair. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
